name: blender-mcp
description: Blender Model Control Protocol (MCP) server for automated 3D content creation and manipulation with support for boudoir assets and Japanese architecture
author: Windsurf Technologies

environment_variables.BLENDER_EXECUTABLE: Path to Blender executable (default: 'blender' in PATH)
environment_variables.BLENDER_MCP_DEBUG: Enable debug mode (optional, set to '1' to enable)

changelog: 1.0.0: Initial release with Japanese architecture and boudoir asset support
